title: Risk Management Matrix
subtitle: Identified Risks, Impact Assessment, and Mitigation Strategies

risks.mitigation: Configurable snapshot interval with fallback to last-known-good state. Latency monitoring with automated alerting when thresholds are exceeded.
Contract-first integration approach with Appendix A schema definitions. Abstracted provider interfaces allow mock-to-production swap without UI changes.
Phased rollout with structured training program. Three-tier UI reduces cognitive load per user role. Operator feedback incorporated iteratively.
Camera health monitoring with degraded-mode operation when coverage drops below threshold. Redundant sensor placement in critical corridors.
Continuous drift monitoring comparing current distributions against training baselines. Automated alerting and governance escalation when drift exceeds thresholds.
Secure-by-design architecture with no PII collection. TLS 1.3 transport encryption. RBAC enforcement. Regular security assessments aligned with UAE IA standards.
Embedded governance tier with audit logging, validation reporting, drift monitoring, and evidence export. Appendix A contract ensures traceability.
Modular architecture supports horizontal scaling. Federated data exchange protocol designed for multi-district operation. Load testing planned for Phase 3.
